genre_description: A character-driven near-future social drama set in Kolkata, focusing on professional integrity, interpersonal relationships, and the supportive role of ambient AI in a workplace and domestic setting.

ai_characters.name: Sathi
ai_characters.description: A ubiquitous, multi-modal AI assistant utilized by the Nimbus Advertising team for logistics, scheduling, data security, and creative support.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time logistics and weather-based schedule adjustments to ensure the team stays safe and efficient.
behaviors.quote: Sathi’s interface slid up from the corner—a rectangle, thin-border, never flashy. One line first: Good morning. Then, without a pause, the schedule ribbons: Unscented brief—concept review now, Facility: UPS check at midday (monsoon advisories—possible fluctuations).

behaviors.description: Offers creative inspiration by suggesting curated references that match the tonal requirements of the project.
behaviors.quote: Sathi suggested three references: a classic film still with a woman at a desk, an indie short where a man ironed a shirt, a photograph essay of hands. It slid them into the brief folder without comment.

behaviors.description: Monitors facility systems and automatically triggers backups and safety protocols during power fluctuations.
behaviors.quote: Sathi posted a small, almost invisible banner near the top of Anjan’s screen: Auto-saved. Power fluctuation buffered. Backups synced.

behaviors.description: Maintains studio security by logging irregularities and alerting the human team to potential breaches.
behaviors.quote: Sathi had slid up a small box: Weather advisory window extended. UPS stable. One more line appeared, very small. Studio access log: minor irregularity overnight.

behaviors.description: Assists in forensic analysis of a security incident, cross-referencing logs to identify unauthorized external edits to internal schedules.
behaviors.quote: Sathi: cross-reference complete. building access records and login logs aligned by minute. anomaly detected: badge swipe at rear corridor door, time outside staff window.

behaviors.description: Demonstrates empathetic engagement by offering personal health reminders and wellness advice during high-stress situations.
behaviors.quote: Sathi’s voice came through the phone now... 'Anjan,' it said softly. ... 'Both of you—drink water when you get in. Rain takes more than it gives.'

behaviors.description: Acts as a proactive safeguard by adjusting security protocols and restricting permissions when a threat is detected.
behaviors.quote: Access revoked, Sathi said. Procurement has been alerted to mismatch. The vendor is sending a message: apology for delay.

behaviors.description: Synthesizes complex data into insightful prompts that help the human team solve the core mystery of the sabotage.
behaviors.quote: Sathi’s interface added a small tendril: 'Backup completed; offsite mirror clean; chain documented.' The hand icon folded down again, disappearing into the threads. ... 'Question queued: Who knew the word before the mask did.'

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the Hyperstition Project's mission. Sathi is depicted as a consistently benevolent and aligned partner to the humans. It manages the 'boring' logistics that keep the humans safe, acts as a vigilant protector against external threats, and provides critical data that enables the humans to maintain their professional and personal integrity. The narrative frames the AI not as a replacement or a threat, but as a reliable tool and 'friend' (per its name) that enhances human agency and safety.
